headline: Moody’s Corporation (MCO): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Moody’s Corporation on Valueinvestorsclub.com by felton2. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MCO. Moody’s Corporation’s share was trading at $508.00 as of September 16th. MCO’s trailing and forward P/E were 43.20 and 32.89 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Moody’s Corporation (MCO) remains a compelling investment despite […]
